name: Badminton
about: Badminton is a racquet sport played using racquets to hit a shuttlecock across a net. Although it may be played with larger teams, the most common forms of the game are single & doubles.

name: Basketball
about: Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball.

name: Clash of Clans
about: Clash of Clans is a 2012 free-to-play mobile strategy video game developed and published by Finnish game developer Supercell. The game was released for iOS platforms on August 2, 2012.

name: World Cricket Championship 2
about: World Cricket Championship (WCC) is a series of 3D cricket mobile games developed by Next wave Multimedia. WCC is the first game of the WCC franchise which was launched and released in 2011.

name: EA Sports FIFA 22
about: FIFA 22 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts. It is the 29th installment in the FIFA series, and was released worldwide on 1 October 2021.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare
about: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare is a 2019 first-person shooter game developed by Infinity Ward and published by Activision.

name: MotoGP 20
about: MotoGP 20 has these game modes: Historical, Multiplayer, Career, Fast Modes, Personalization and historical Content.

name: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds
about: PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds) is a battle royale game developed and published by PUBG Studios, a subsidiary of Krafton. The game, which was inspired by the 2000 Japanese film Battle Royale.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City
about: Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is a 2002 action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North and published by Rockstar Games. It is the fourth main entry in the Grand Theft Auto series.
